name: Dino Pets
description:
Choose from over 100 adorable baby dinosaurs to play with, teach, and train. Watch your dinosaur grow, learn tricks and win pet shows with their amazing new talents. Use the DS stylus to interact with your pet as your dino becomes your new best friend!

  • 101 Dinosaurs to Adopt and Love: Choose from your favorite dinosaurs including the Tyrannosaurus Rex!
  • Dino Talents: Teach your Dino to jump, fly, dance & more.
  • Dino Shop: Earn money to buy fun upgrades, treats and toys for your pet!
  • Fun & Games: Play your favorite games with your Dino Pet!
  • Touch and Train: Use the Nintendo DS Stylus to care for and play with your Dino Pet.
